FILE.name: burgundy
FILE.STRING: Do not let your enemies take any cities.

FILE.name: jena
FILE.STRING: Enemy reinforcements have arrived! We must retreat!
Units can be created instantly to reinforce fallen allies.
Capture the fringe cities to force the battle onto open field.
The enemy is retreating to rally around Jena. Now is our moment!
Use your superior numbers to take Jena.
HINT: Use the infinite queue feature to keep your ranks up.

FILE.name: leipzig
FILE.STRING: Our scouts have reported that General Schwarzenberg is arriving with an army from the south!
Get a foothold in the region at Lutzen.

Excellent work! The citizens of the area will not succumb to your rule easily. If you seized the area's economy and infrastructure, they would have no choice but to bow to your power. Find and control the major centers for Food, Timber, Metal, Knowledge and Government.
Capture a Granary to help your Food production.
Capture a Lumber Mill to help your Timber production.
Capture a Smelter to help your Metal production.
Capture a University to help your Knowledge production.
Capture a Senate in order to use Governments.
Well done! You now control the majority of food production in the region and can comfortably expand your farmer employment.
Superb! You now control the enlightened population in the region and can expand the schooling as you see fit.
Magnificent! You now control the majority of metal production in the region and can comfortably expand your miner employment.
Fantastic! You now control the voice of the people in this region and can manipulate the law as you see fit from a Senate.

The traitor Bernadotte and General Bennigsen have been spotted to the north with reinforcements! We are badly outnumbered. If we retreat now, we may be able to regroup with the spoils already taken from the area. (Gain 50 Tribute.)
Our scouts have reported that Commander Schwarzenberg is arriving with an army from the south!

The cunning Archduke Charles and General Blucher have been spotted to the north with reinforcements! We are badly outnumbered. If we retreat now, we may be able to regroup with the spoils already taken from the area. (Gain 50 Tribute.)
Great job! You now control the majority of wood production in the region and can comfortably expand your woodcutter employment.

The cunning Archduke Charles and General Blucher have been spotted to the north with reinforcements! We are badly outnumbered. If we retreat now, we may be able to regroup with the spoils already taken from the area. (Gain 100 Tribute and a Mercenaries Bonus Card.)

FILE.name: lowrationsruss
FILE.STRING: Hint: Gain extra troops by capturing cities.
A prisoner from $STRING0 decided to share with us the location of the enemy's capital.
A freed prisoner from $STRING0 decided to share with us the location of one of the enemy's other cities! However, there may be a closer city.
We have recruited a group of Fusiliers.
We have recruited a group of Musketeers.
We have recruited a Horse Guard Grenadier.
We have recruited a Supply Wagon.

FILE.name: lowrationsturk
FILE.STRING: Hint: Gain extra troops by capturing cities.
A prisoner from $STRING0 decided to share with us the location of the enemy's capital.
We have recruited a group of Fusiliers.
We have recruited a group of Musketeers.
We have recruited a Horse Guard Grenadier.
We have recruited a Supply Wagon.
A freed prisoner from $STRING0 decided to share with us the location of one of the enemy's other cities! However, there may be a closer city.

FILE.name: newmontenotte
FILE.STRING: Hint: Build new troops at your military buildings.

FILE.name: belgiumruntime
FILE.STRING: Our scouts report that an emissary of Austria is approaching.
Our scouts report that an emissary of the Austrians is approaching.

Message from the local Austrian Commander: We do not want to fight over a province that is so far away from our homeland. If you pay us 20 Tribute, we will leave this province. (You have $d0 Tribute.)
Unfortunately, you do not have 20 Tribute.
Since we are here anyway, perhaps we can help subdue the people of this province for you. That is, if you are willing to make it worth our while. (You have $d0 Tribute.)
Unfortunately, you do not have 20 Tribute. The Austrians are leaving.

FILE.name: britainruntime
FILE.STRING: Your admirals have gathered your Grand Navy and are ready for your assault on London. They await you near Amiens.
The British government is fleeing north to Scotland!
The British government is fleeing west to Ireland!
The British government is fleeing back to England!
Your admirals have gathered your Grand Navy and are ready for your assault on London. They await you near Calais.

FILE.name: brittanyruntime
FILE.STRING: An emissary of the British has asked for an audience.
Very well, but remember this: Any further loss of life is on your head!
We wish to put an end to the hostilities between our great nations. We will agree to leave this province and sign a peace treaty for 20 tribute. (You have $d0 Tribute.)
Unfortunately, you do not have 20 Tribute.

FILE.name: corsicaruntime
FILE.STRING: Capture all of the enemy's cities before time runs out.

FILE.name: eylauruntime
FILE.STRING: Capture and hold Eylau until time runs out.
Hint: Use control groups to better organize your armies (i.e., CTRL+1, CTRL+2, etc.).
One of your marshals has arrived with reinforcements!

FILE.name: friedlandruntime
FILE.STRING: Hold out against the combined Prussian and Russian forces until Napoleon arrives with reinforcements.
Napoleon has arrived with the bulk of the French army!
Napoleon has arrived with the bulk of the French army! It is time to crush the Russians and take Friedland!

FILE.name: lodi2runtime
FILE.STRING: You will be defeated if the Milanese lose their capital of Milan.

We have many things for sale. Royal Janissaries at our Barracks, Culverin Mahouts at our Stable, and Basilica Cannons at our Siege Factory. Click on the building that has what you want in order to buy something.
Hint: Click on the Merchant Prince's (White) buildings to buy units.
Would you like to buy 5 Royal Janissaries for $NUM0 Tribute? (You have $NUM1 Tribute.)
Would you like to buy 3 Elephants for $NUM0 Tribute? (You have $NUM1 Tribute.)
Would you like to buy 3 Basilica Cannons for $NUM0 Tribute? (You have $NUM1 Tribute.)
Sorry, you do not have enough Tribute.

FILE.name: lodiruntime
FILE.STRING: We have many things for sale. Royal Janissaries at our Barracks, Culverin Mahouts at our Stable, and Basilica Cannons at our Siege Factory. Click on the building that has what you want in order to buy something.
Hint: Click on the Merchant Prince's (Orange) buildings to buy units.

Message from the Austrians: Our troops no longer wish to fight. Perhaps you would like to sign a peace agreement to end this war, provided you do not attack us anytime soon? We will include 50 Tribute and our territory of Belgium in the bargain.
Would you like to buy 5 Royal Janissaries for $NUM0 Tribute? (You have $NUM1 Tribute.)
Sorry, you do not have enough Tribute.
Would you like to buy 3 Elephants for $NUM0 Tribute? (You have $NUM1 Tribute.)
Would you like to buy 3 Basilica Cannons for $NUM0 Tribute? (You have $NUM1 Tribute.)

FILE.name: madridruntime
FILE.STRING: An emissary of Great Britain approaches: We wish to speak with you on behalf of our Spanish friends.

We see that you have placed the Spanish throne in dire straits. We wish to settle this affair without any further bloodshed. If you agree to sign a peace treaty with Spain and leave this province then we will also sign a peace treaty with you.

We see that you have placed the Spanish throne in dire straits. We wish to settle this affair without any further bloodshed, but if you do not agree to sign a peace treaty with Spain and leave this province immediately we will be forced to take action!
Great Britain has declared war on you!

FILE.name: mantuaruntime
FILE.STRING: Hint: Try to capture Austrian (Blue) cities behind Mantua before assaulting it directly.
Hint: Try to ally with the Venetians (Orange).
Message from a Venetian (Orange) emissary: The city of Venice has been independent for all of time. Do not think that you will change this. Stay out of our way, and we'll do the same for you.

Now that the Austrians (Blue) are dead, we can move on to help free the Venetians (Orange) of their excess wealth. On the other hand, we could just let them stay independent, and we would still control this province.
With the loss of their stronghold, the Austrians (Blue) are fleeing.

FILE.name: montenotte4runtime
FILE.STRING: We have found the surviving Austrian soldiers' camp. Their leader wishes to speak with you.
Greetings Napoleon, I am Commander Schwarzenberg. We are glad that you came to help our cause. If you are successful in retaking this territory for us, we will pay you very handsomely.
Excellent, I will take my team of Commandos and work on destroying their infrastructure. We will hand over our city of Montenotte to you for the time being.
Fine, have it your way. This means war!

Greetings Napoleon, I am Commander Schwarzenberg. My men and I were left behind when the Austrians pulled out of this territory. We are now mercenaries, and are willing to assist you for 15 Tribute (you have $NUM0 Tribute).
Fine, have it your way. I am sure we can get 15 Tribute reward for your head from any government on the continent.
We have found the surviving Austrian soldiers' leader. He wishes to speak with you.
The Austrian (Orange) cities have been abandoned. They should be easy to capture.
Find Commander Schwarzenberg (White) to gain his help.
Excellent, I will take my team of Commandos and work on destroying their infrastructure.
It is a shame you have so little Tribute. We might have helped you. Oh well, instead I will have to settle for your head on a platter.

FILE.name: montenotteruntime
FILE.STRING: Destroy the $NUM0 Austrian (Blue) Fortresses or capture the Sardinian (Cyan) capital.
Hint: Try to ally with the Genoans (White) or the Sardinians (Cyan).
Destroy the $NUM0 Austrian (Blue) Fortress or capture the Sardinian (Cyan) capital.
We had a different amount in mind.
We are looking for more than that.
We will need you to up the offer.

FILE.name: napoleon_battles
FILE.STRING: While they are not a major power, I would still be wary of the Bavarians' skill on the battlefield.

The British have established a powerful empire that is spread across the world. Their armies, though small, are well-trained, and they are rightly proud of their Royal Navy, that "wooden wall" that rings their island nation. Their colonies give them a large economic advantage.
The Dutch do not pose much of a threat on the Continent. They are more concerned with their overseas colonies.
The Portuguese are of minor consequence on the Continent, yet have vast domains around the world.
The Poles pose no threat to the armies of France.
The Sardinians are little more than pawns of the emperor of Austria.
The French Royalists have begun an insurrection in this province. It is up to you to put them down.
The Papal States claim an importance in the councils of Europe that has little basis in fact.
The Russians can be friendly at times, but one should not trust them.

While the Spanish empire may be in decline, their colonies are still numerous. We must also be wary of the Spanish people, for even if we remove their King they will continue to fight until the very end.
The Ottoman Turks control extensive domains, but pose no threat to us.
There is little of importance here.
The Ottoman-appointed rulers of Egypt, the Mamelukes, are oppressing their Egyptian subjects. It is up to you to free them and bring the blessings of the Revolution to Egypt.
A great victory could be had in Syria. Surely the Ottoman Turks would not mind having one less province? They might not even notice!
This will not be an easy fight. Come in strength, if you want to win this battle.
The capital province of Austria. It will not be a hard fight to take Vienna, but we may have trouble with the outlying regions of the capital.
A massive force has been brought together to do battle here. Their numbers dwarf ours in the area, but with your leadership we certainly will be victorious.
The British have taken control of Brittany and gained a foothold on the Continent. We must drive them out to protect the sovereignty of France!
The Prussians in this area will not cause as many problems as the Russians. They have a formidable force here.
The Prussian and Russian armies are both in the area somewhere. This will not be an easy fight for us.
The Prussians have maintained a presence here and are working with the Russians. This will not be an easy fight for us.
The British defenses are too great and we do not have a navy! We must reduce their infrastructure level and build a navy before we attack!
The British defenses are too great! The Royal Navy is constantly patrolling the English Channel. We must reduce their infrastructure level before we attack!
Even though the British defenses are weak, we have not yet constructed a navy. We should wait until we are able to attack with warships as well as our superior army.
The British defenses are weak! We must take this opportunity to attack!
The British do not have enough military presence here to cause us any problems. The inhabitants of the island, however, are legendary sharpshooters.
Our scouts tell us that the people of this region are already familiar with your accomplishments elsewhere. Hopefully that means there will be little bloodshed here.
The Austrians have recently lost this territory to the Papal States. The Austrians former subjects, the Milanese, are asking for our assistance.
We will have limited supplies, but with good leadership we can beat the enemy.
The Papal States have recently conquered this territory. They burnt most of the towns to the ground. Which is exactly what they would like to do to us if we invaded.
If we can take this province, it is not much further to the Austrian capital. The key to this province is their stronghold of Mantua. If we can take this, victory is ours.
You must strike the enemy allied forces before they cross into France!
The Austrians must not be allowed to control a province so near to France!
Russia has a very harsh climate. The battle will be costly and hard to win. Perhaps we should consider making peace instead.
The Spanish people will be resentful of any occupation. They will keep fighting a guerrilla war long after we have defeated Spain's Royal Army.
We will not only have to fight the Spanish army, but we will also have to combat the guerrilla bands in the area.
We will not only have to fight the Portuguese army, but we will also have to combat the guerrilla bands in the area.
Saxony may be small, but their soldiers fight hard.
The Prussians--heirs to Frederick the Great--should not be taken lightly. Still, they have no hope of victory if we attack them.
The Austrian Empire is a proud but aging empire. Its time as a Continental power is drawing to an end.
The key to this province is the island of Malta. We will have to do the impossible--beat the Knights of Malta.
A small town in this region is being terrorized by a lord in a castle across the river. If we help them they are sure to join with France.
The Swedish come from a cold, harsh climate. Although they may seem but a minor player on the Continent, do not underestimate their ability to have a large impact on Continental affairs.

FILE.name: napoleon_diplo
FILE.STRING: No English king will ever submit to the whims of a French despot.
Unlike France, we British do not give up our colonies. We will never consider giving even one up. And lest you think to ask again, remember that we took Canada and India from you in 1763.
We do not negotiate with traitors to the crown.
We Swiss are always willing to trade--but watches, chocolates, and other such things are our preference. We do not traffic in land.
What could a country without a navy do with overseas colonies? Or perhaps you meant to amuse us with your query.
There is no bad peace in our eyes.
There is no bad alliance in our eyes.
If you wish us to become servant to France, offer us a price that is equal to our pride and our value. You aren't even close with that one.
The deal is looking more agreeable, but we are still not convinced.
We have no interest in negotiating with you. All we need to do is conquer your nation and Europe will be ours.
There is no need for a peace agreement between us since we are already allies.
Yes, let us end this terrible war!
Very well. We will end this war and sign your peace treaty.
Alright, we need some time to prepare for a new assault as well.
Yes, we agree. Peace is in the best interests of everyone.
These are excellent terms! We will agree to this peace treaty.
Perhaps it would be better if we negotiated peace before talking about alliances.
The Sultan thinks that this is a fine game.
No thank you. We have enough allies at the moment.
We had been considering a similar offer to yours. We believe our nations will work well together.
We look forward to working with France.
Yes! Who shall we destroy first?
Yes! Now no one will be able to stop the $s0! Oh, um, I mean the $s0 and the $s1!
These are excellent terms! We will agree to this alliance.
We are going to need at least this much tribute if you want our help.
That is a paltry sum to offer us. We need something more like this.
We will not sign an alliance for anything less than this.
Yes. Who would not want to join with the Empire of Napoleon?
Your offer is a fair one, and our armies will now march alongside yours.
We needed a change of government anyways.
We agree. Who do we have to kill first?
That is a fair offer. We will become your vassal.
Well we have always considered your land ours anyway.
We appreciate this gesture. It saves us a lot of time.
Even though we are at war, we are willing to make a deal, but only according to our terms.
This is a fair trade. We accept.
His Majesty is pleased we could reach this agreement.
This deal seems more than fair. No refunds!
Very well, I suppose we can agree to this.
Well, if this is the best you can do I guess we can agree.
No, that is not fair to our nation. We believe it should be something like this.
We do not agree to your offer, but perhaps you will agree to this?
That was a good offer. Here's a better one.
That deal does not seem fair to us. Consider this proposal instead.
We accept your tribute with gratitude.
And you want nothing in return? Well ok if you say so.
Your gift comes at the perfect time! Now we can upgrade our capital's defenses and make it invulnerable.
Our monarch is always happy to accept such gifts.
We yield. We will pay this tribute to you.
We feel it would be prudent to give in to your demands at this time.
OK! OK! Please don't squash us.
Why should we pay you? If anything, you should pay us!
This is outrageous! We will never acquiesce to such extortion.
Is this a joke? You are kidding aren't you?
You have nothing to offer us that will make us give up our independence.
We will not give up our freedom for such a paltry sum.
You will have to give us much more than that if you expect us to listen to you.
Our great nation will never bow before the boot of tyranny.
We will never sell our nation for so little. You do not have enough to interest us at present.
Why would we agree to peace? We have so much yet to gain from the spoils of your country.
Only a fool would sign that treaty!
Only your utter destruction will end this war
We are not as weak as you, and we will see this war through until the very end.
We do not see how this benefits us. Our answer is no.
Our great nation has no need to ally with the likes of you. Besides, we enjoy trampling the weak.
Under different circumstances we might have welcomed an alliance with you. Unfortunately for you, that means we cannot accept your offer.
Your nation is not capable of offering serious help to anybody. We have no time for the likes of you.
Come back in a few turns when you have things that interest us.
You do not have enough to interest us at present.
This deal would be more to our liking.
We will never submit ourselves to the whims of a French despot.
Unfortunately you have nothing of interest to us at present.
You will need to find more to offer us if you want us to agree to deal.
Conquer more territories and maybe then we will negotiate.
There is nothing you presently have that would compell us to sign that agreement.
We did not come here to negotiate the finer points of our offer. You should've accepted while you had the chance.
Perhaps you thought that we actually cared what you thought about the deal. These negotiations are over!
Who do you think you are to haggle over our offer? You have forgotten your place. This discussion is at its end.
If you wish to discuss vassalage, then territory will have to be removed from the negotiations.
Perhaps you thought that we actually cared what you thought about the deal. Accept our terms, or there is no deal.
Perhaps you thought that we actually came here to negotiate. Accept our terms, or there is no deal.
Are you here to negotiate, or to waste our time?
We tire of your games. Offer us a real proposal, or be done with it!
Apparently negotiation is not one of the finer points of education in your nation.
We did not come here to play around. If this is the best you can offer, then perhaps we should end these negotiations.
That is one of the worst offers I have ever seen. Is it some kind of joke?
If you wish to discuss vassalage, then territory and colonies will have to be removed from the negotiations.
If you wish to discuss vassalage, then colonies will have to be removed from the negotiations.
If you think that we will bargain with a lowly general of France, then you are quite wrong. Our discussions are through.

FILE.name: napoleon_diplo_offer
FILE.STRING: The territory of Venetia is much closer to our capital of Austria than it is to Paris. We think it would be to our mutual benefit if you were to accept Belgium in exchange for Venetia. We will also sign a peace agreement as part of the deal.
The Austrian government feels that this war must come to an end. Will you sign a peace agreement?
There is no need for further conflict. We offer you peace.
Since our Austrian allies have abandoned us, His Majesty's government has decided to offer France a peace agreement as well.
We know how troublesome colonies can be, so his Majesty King George III has graciously offered to take on the burden of ruling Louisiana from you. There is no need to express your thanks to him.
With Prussia defeated we do not see any reason to continue this war. We will sign a peace treaty if you agree that we will keep control of East and West Prussia.
Why do you continue to attack us? Continued warfare can profit neither nation.
You have bested us yet again, Emperor Napoleon. Perhaps you would be interested in peace now?
This war is damaging both our empires. Let us end it now.
We are impressed with your display of military power. You have clearly learned something from studying our military methods. We would like to enter into an alliance with you.
We have enough trouble keeping peace in our territories in the Balkans, so in return for returning the territories that are rightfully ours, we will compensate you with a peace treaty.
We do not see a need to pursue this war any further.
The Hapsburgs can no longer tolerate your presence in Southern Italy. Leave now, and you will be well-compensated.
It is time for you to leave Southern Italy. Leave now, and we will compensate you.
We have no quarrel with France. Let us end hostilities against one another.
There is no need for more war between our nations.
We have no interest in continuing this war against you. Let us agree to peace and you shall receive our colony in Brazil.
We have no interest in continuing this war against you. Let us agree to peace and you shall receive our colony in Macao, located on the South China Sea in the Far East.
We have supported you in war. Now it is time to give us the compensation we deserve as your allies.
We have joined with France on the battlefield. Now, if you wish to continue this alliance we must be rewarded for our loyalty.
Alliances are a result of trust, goodwill, and mutual goals. France has achieved her goals. Now it is time to help Holland achieve hers.
His Majesty Frederick William is pleased to offer an alliance to France.
While His Majesty Frederick William thanks you for looking after his territory, it is well past time to return what is ours. You will be compensated handsomely.
Poland is the rightful property of Saxony.
In our quest to dominate central Europe, we have found a need for Tribute.
We think an alliance would be a most appropriate action at this point in time.
We think a peace treaty would be a most appropriate action at this point in time.
We have little interest in the affairs of Western Europe, but perhaps an alliance there will free up some of our forces to fight elsewhere.
We have no interest in the affairs of Western Europe. Let us sign a peace treaty so that we can focus our efforts elsewhere.
Emperor, you have been a great friend. Let us sign an alliance.
Emperor, this war is leading to no good. Let us sign a peace treaty.
The Austrians wish to discuss a diplomatic resolution to this war with the great general who has defeated their armies.
The Austrians tire of this endless war. They wish to hold negotiations for its end.
The British diplomat wishes to confer with you about diplomatic matters.
The British diplomat has arrived to bargain over one of our colonies.
Tsar Alexander I of Russia wishes to come to an agreement that will end the war between our nations.
Emperor Franz I of Austria wants to talk with you about what it will take to end our differences.
The Prussian diplomat has arrived, looking to discuss current Franco-Prussian relation.
The Sultan of the Ottoman Turks desires to settle the current dispute between France and his empire.
King George III of Britain is asking to negotiate with you about the current conflict between our nations.
The Austrians are outraged at our current presence in Italy. They wish to confer with you to reach an agreement that will make both of us happy.
The Papal States are upset at our presence in Italy. They wish to confer with you to reach an agreement that will make both of us happy.
The Dutch no longer want to continue this war against us and have come to negotiate.
The Spanish hope to end current hostilities with France by sitting down at the negotiating table with you.
Queen Maria I of Portugal desires to chat with you about Franco-Portuguese relations.
Our allies the Bavarians wish to discuss compensation for their continued support.
Our allies the Saxons desire to discuss a reward for their continued support.
Stadtholder William V of the Dutch wishes to chat about compensation for his continued support.
Frederick William I wishes to discuss Franco-Prussian diplomatic relations.
The Prussians have invited us to sit down at the negotiating table with them.
King Frederick Augustus I of Saxony desires an audience with you.
The Swiss have requested an audience with you.
The Sultan of the Ottoman Empire desires to discuss relations between our empires.
The Swedish wish to talk with you at the negotiating table.
The Austrians wish to discuss a possible diplomatic resolution to this war.
The Austrians tire of this endless war. They wish to initiate negotiations to end it.
The British ambassador wishes to confer with you about diplomatic matters.
The British diplomat wishes to discuss the status of one of our colonies.
Tsar Alexander I of Russia wishes to discuss a possible agreement that will end the war between our nations.
Emperor Franz I of Austria wishes to reach an agreement that will end our differences.
The Prussian diplomat has arrived, looking to discuss current Franco-Prussian relations.
King George III of Britain wishes to negotiate with you about an end of the current conflict between our nations.
The Austrians are outraged at our current presence in Italy. They wish to initiate discussions about an agreement that will make both sides happy.
The Papal States are upset at our intrusion in Italy. They wish to initiate discussions about an agreement that will make both sides happy.
Our allies, the Bavarians, wish to discuss compensation for their continued support.
Our allies, the Saxons, desire to discuss a reward for their continued support.

FILE.name: napoleon_init
FILE.STRING: It is true we have had a Revolution--but not enough of one to give a mere general, and a young one at that, the authority to direct France's foreign policy!

Either take charge of the Army of Italy in Marseilles and capture the Sardinian territory of Piedmont, or take charge of the Army of the West in Paris and put down the French Royalist revolt in Burgundy.

FILE.name: napoleon_post_turn
FILE.STRING: The territory of Savoy has decided to join the French republic. They were impressed by your victory in Piedmont.
As thanks for saving them in Lombardy, the Austrians have signed a peace treaty with us.
As thanks for saving them in Lombardy, the Austrians have signed an alliance with us.
As thanks for saving them in Lombardy, the Austrians have given us 50 Tribute.
Impressed with your victory in the last battle, the Sardinians have decided to become France's vassal.
In honor of the Genoans courage in the last battle, you have changed the name of Piedmont to Genoa.
The people of Moravia have chosen to join with the Prussians rather than subsist under your rule.
The people of Moravia have chosen to join with the Saxons rather than subsist under your rule.
The people of Moravia have chosen to join with the Bavarians rather than subsist under your rule.
The people of Moravia have chosen to join with the Russians rather than subsist under your rule.

With the conquest of the Spanish capital, we have taken control of the Louisiana Territory and with this have gained total control of the Mississippi River. The Americans are known to have an interest in free passage on the Mississippi River. If we wait long enough perhaps they will make us an offer.
A representative from the United States of America is here inquiring about travel rights on the Mississippi River. Would you like to meet with him?
American Representative: We would like to purchase the city of New Orleans in order to secure free passage on the Mississippi River. We offer 25 Tribute.
American Representative: You are a most reasonable ruler. I am glad we could complete this transaction.
American Representative: That is most unfortunate. Perhaps one day you will reconsider.
American Representative: It is most unfortunate that you do not agree to that price. Perhaps we can still purchase New Orleans for 25 Tribute?

You have suffered a great defeat. The French people have given up on you, and your opponents have exiled you from the Continent to the tiny island of Elba. There is still hope, however. If you were to escape and win a magnificent victory, the French people would surely accept you as their leader again. Win the battle and attempt to return France to its glory.

You realize that much has changed in Europe in your absence. Those who oppose you have gathered their forces north of France, in the Low Countries. If you hope to save France you must attack Belgium and defeat your enemies.

The French people are like most--they will cheer a victor as long as he keeps winning, and abandon him the moment he suffers a reverse. Your people have deposed you, and your former foes have sent you into exile. This time, your enemies have sent you to an island far from Europe, from where you can never escape. Your days of glory are at an end.
You have impressed the Directorate. Due to France's greater interest in the coast off of Italy, you are ordered to capture the island of Corsica.

You have impressed the Directorate. It orders you to continue advancing into Northern Italy and capture the Austrian territory of Lombardy. Also, the Army of the West in Paris has been defeated, so the Directorate now sends you its full support and gives you a Metal Economic Boom bonus card.
The members of the Directorate are disappointed with the result of your last battle. They send you a Mercenaries bonus card in the hope that you will not repeat this mistake.

The Directorate demands that you explain yourself. You were supposed to attack Piedmont or Burgundy, not rest on your laurels in France! Well, now you have no choice because the Army of the West in Paris has deserted its post. Take the army in Marseilles and capture Piedmont.
The Directorate is impressed with your progress. It has recalled your army to Piedmont so that you can conquer the Papal States, and provided you with the Propaganda bonus card to help your attack.
The members of the Directorate are mildly pleased with your recent negotiations. They hope you can follow orders this time by conquering Tuscany, the capital of the Papal States.
The Directorate orders you to continue marching through Italy into the heavily defended territory of Venetia.

Following your recent military successes, the Directorate offers you one of two different commands: You can either lead the army that will invade Spain, or take command of an army that is being sent to conquer North Africa. Choose which army you will command, then attack!

The Directorate has ordered you and your army back to Paris. It wants you to drive the British out of Brittany before you do anything else. In addition, the Army of Italy in Marseilles has been defeated, so the Directorate is putting its full support behind you and has given you a Food Economic Boom.
The Directorate is disappointed with the result of your last battle. They will provide you with extra troops to start your next battle in the hope that you will not repeat this mistake.
The Directorate has ordered you and your army back to Paris. They want you to drive the Austrians from Belgium before you do anything else.

Following your recent military successes, the Directorate offers you one of two different commands: You can either lead the army that will invade Spain, or take command of an army that is being sent to conquer North Africa. Choose which army you will command, then attack!
The Directorate congratulates you on your continued success. Keep them pleased by capturing the Spanish territory of Seville.
While the Directorate is pleased, they will not be truly happy with you until you dethrone the Spanish ruler by capturing the Spanish capital territory of Castile.
The territory of Libya has welcomed our army without a fight. The Directorate orders you onward to capture the treasures of Egypt.
The Directorate wishes you to gain control of Syria.

Your success on the battlefield has made you the toast of Paris! Capitalizing on your rising popularity, you have crowned yourself Emperor of France. You now have full command of the French Empire. While you would like nothing better than to force your will upon the Continent, you will have to use diplomacy if you plan on uniting Europe under your banner.
A new type of Light Infantry, the Royal Guard, has been commissioned to protect you. The Royal Guard has more hit points and armor than Musketeers. They can be trained at your Barracks.
It is true we have had a Revolution--but not enough of one to give a mere general, and a young one at that, the authority to direct France's foreign policy!

To bring Perfidious Albion, also known as Great Britain, to her knees you must build a Grand Navy. We must balance our resources wisely, however. You must decide how important it is to invade the British Isles.(You have $d0 tribute)
Unfortunately you do not have 100 Tribute.
Unfortunately you do not have 50 Tribute.
Excellent. For 25 more tribute we can also send out a decoy fleet, thus reducing Great Britain's defensive strength.(You have $d0 tribute)
The governors of East and West Prussia have allowed Russia to occupy their lands in retaliation for our conquest of Brandenburg!
A group of settlers has come to ask for funding to found a new colony. Do you wish to give them 70 Tribute for funding?
The settlers we sent off to found a colony have sent word that they have established the colony of $STRING0 in the name of France. We will now be receiving Tribute and rare resources from there.

Either take charge of the Army of Italy in Marseilles and capture the Sardinian territory of Piedmont, or take charge of the Army of the West in Paris and put down the French Royalist revolt in Burgundy.
Increase France's holdings in the Mediterranean by conquering Corsica.
Continue the conquest of Northern Italy by conquering the Austrian territory of Lombardy.
Conquer all of Southern Italy by attacking the Papal States capital of Tuscany.
Complete your conquest of Northern Italy with the defeat of the Austrians in Venetia.
Continue unifying France by expelling the British from Brittany.
Expand French borders by taking Belgium from the Austrians.

Either take charge of the Army of the South in Bordeaux and capture the Spanish territory of Aragon, or take charge of the Army of the Far East in Marseilles and capture the Turkish territory of Tunisia.
Continue your conquest of Spain by taking the territory of Seville.
Complete your conquest of Spain by defeating the Spanish at their capital territory of Castile.
Continue your conquest of Northern Africa by capturing the Mameluke territory of Egypt.
Expand France's interest in the eastern Mediterranean by taking the Ottoman territory of Syria.
A new type of light infantry, the Imperial Guard, has been commissioned to protect you. The Imperial Guard has more hit points and armor than Musketeers. They can be trained at your Barracks.
The other nations of Europe refuse to negotiate with you.

To bring Perfidious Albion, also known as Great Britain, to her knees you must build a Grand Navy. We must balance our resources wisely, however. You must decide how important it is to invade the British Isles and spend your resources accordingly. (You have $d0 tribute)
Excellent. For 25 more tribute we can also send out a decoy fleet, thus reducing Great Britain's defensive strength. (You have $d0 tribute)

To bring Perfidious Albion, also known as Great Britain, to her knees you must build a Grand Navy. We must balance our resources wisely, however. You must decide how important it is to invade the British Isles and spend your resources accordingly. The more tribute we spend, the larger our fleet will be when we attack Great Britain from France. (You have $d0 tribute)
American Representative: This is most unexpected! I am not really authorized to approve such a large transaction but how can I refuse? We will give you 150 tribute for the Louisiana Territory.
Since no nation recognizes you as the rightful leader of France, you are unable to conduct negotiations or play strategic Bonus Cards.

You have impressed the Directorate. They order you to continue advancing into Northern Italy and capture the Austrian territory of Lombardy. Also, the Army of the West in Paris has been defeated, so the Directorate now sends you their full support and gives you 25 Tribute.
Be careful of failure, as it will lead to your exile.
American Representative: This is most unexpected! I am not really authorized to approve such a large transaction, but how can I refuse? We will give you 150 Tribute for the Louisiana Territory.

FILE.name: portugalruntime
FILE.STRING: An emissary of Great Britain approaches: We wish to speak with you on behalf of our Portugese friends.

We see that you have placed the Portuguese throne in dire straits. We wish to settle this affair without any further bloodshed. If you agree to sign a peace treaty with Portugal and leave this province, then we will also sign a peace treaty with you.

We see that you have placed the Portuguese throne in dire straits. We wish to settle this affair without any further bloodshed; however, if you do not agree to sign a peace treaty with Portugal and leave this province immediately, we will be forced to take action!
Great Britain has declared war upon you!

FILE.name: pyramidsruntime
FILE.STRING: Hint: Try capturing the coastal city of Alexandria before going further inland.

Sire, we should give control of the city of $STRING0 to the Egyptian people. Our war is against the Mamelukes, after all, not the Egyptian people. Also, this could spur goodwill from Egyptian cities down the line.

You have freed the Egyptians (Purple). As part of the agreement, we will not build any new cities in Egypt. However, since they need our military support, the Egyptians can help us construct our military buildings. If you select one of their Citizens, he will switch to our team temporarily.
Also, the Egyptians have agreed to pay us taxes as thanks for freeing them. At what percent shall we tax the free Egyptians (Purple) Commerce?
The Egyptians will pay us 50% of their resource production. You can check the current amount of taxes for each resource by looking at your resource gather rate in the upper left corner.
The Egyptians will pay us 33% of their resource production. You can check the current amount of taxes for each resource by looking at your resource gather rate in the upper left corner.
The Egyptians will pay us 20% of their resource production. You can check the current amount of taxes for each resource by looking at your resource gather rate in the upper left corner.
The people of Rosetta are handing you the city without a fight, due to your humane treatment of the Egyptians in Alexandria.
The people of Alexandria are handing you the city without a fight, due to your humane treatment of the Egyptians in Rosetta.

Many of the Mamelukes (Blue) have taken to the hillsides. We will now have to worry about their raids. The only way to stop them is to destroy their Fortresses in their cities and to the west and south.
Destroy the Mameluke (Blue) Fortresses in their cities and to the west and south.
Hint: Select an Egyptian citizen in order to construct military buildings.

FILE.name: russiaruntime
FILE.STRING: Russian partisans have set fire to $s0! The city center has been razed to the ground!
The Russians have declared that they will continue fighting until the bitter end! Hold Moscow until the timer runs out to defeat them!
Hold Moscow until the timer runs out.
Taking $s0 has increased the security of your supply lines. You can buy 5 Supply Wagons OR 5 Cannons for 5 Tribute at this time. (You have $d1.)
Regrettably, you do not have enough Tribute to buy the Supply Wagons.
Regrettably, you do not have enough Tribute to buy any more Cannons.

FILE.name: syriaruntime
FILE.STRING: Hint: Bribe enemy units to join your side.
Turkish militia have burned $STRING0 to the ground rather than let us have it.
We have recruited a group of Musketeers.
We have recruited a group of Fusiliers.
We have recruited a Supply Wagon.
Use plunder gained from destroying buildings to build new units.

FILE.name: turkeyruntime
FILE.STRING: We have found new Civic technology in the city of Istanbul.
We have found new Commerce technology in the city of Istanbul.
We have found new Science technology in the city of Istanbul.
We have found new Military technology in the city of Istanbul.
We have found 300 Wealth in the city of Istanbul.
The people of Bursa have shown our Explorers how to see farther. Their Line-of-Sight has been increased.
We have confiscated a group of five War Elephants from a local merchant in Ankara. They are now yours to command.
The people of Famagusta have taught us how to fish these waters better. Our fishing boats will now gather 25% more Food and 10% more Wealth.
Some citizens of Adana have agreed to help you instantly assimilate the next city you capture.
We have found new Military technology in the city of Halab.
We have found new Science technology in the city of Halab.
We have found new Commerce technology in the city of Halab.
We have found new Civic technology in the city of Halab.
We have found 300 Wealth in the city of Halab.

FILE.name: wagramruntime
FILE.STRING: Capture the Austrian (Blue) cities of Aspern and Essling to get some of the Austrians to join your side.
Hint: Watch out for an Austrian counter-attack on Vienna.
Austrian traitors are flocking to our side upon the capture of Aspern and Essling.
Capture the Austrian (Blue) cities of Aspern and Essling.

FILE.name: waterlooruntime
FILE.STRING: Take Waterloo and defeat all of the enemy armies.
Build up Waterloo's defenses and defeat all of the enemy armies.

FILE.name: transylvaniaruntime
FILE.STRING: Thank you so much. We shall give you what little help we have to offer.

Thank goodness an army has arrived! The terrible Lord Vlad Tepes (Purple) is threatening our village. We are afraid that if we do not get help, he will soon take us over. Will you lend us your support?
